purpose: Showcase the capabilities of the Elixir LangChain library in a web application context.
principle: Utilizes LangChain for chaining language model operations and Phoenix for web application development.
reusability: Designed as a demo project, it can be used as a reference for integrating LangChain with Phoenix in Elixir projects.
limitations: Primarily a demo project, not intended for production use; limited documentation and support.
name: langchain_demo
description: Demo web project using the Elixir LangChain library
highlight: Demonstrates the integration of the Elixir LangChain library with the Phoenix framework for building AI-driven web applications.
